name: DirrbleDuck_0.2
description:
One long neck boi duck to save the rest of the ducks from imminent doom.  He's got the longest neck, so he's the best shot they got. 

Controls:

Make sure to click on the screen when the game is loaded so your mouse stays in place.

Move: A and D

Run: Left Shift

Jump: Space Bar

Move neck and head with mouse

Pause/Quit: Escape
